title: How to set up Feature Flags in Python with Flask
description: Discover how easy and efficient it is to implement feature flags in your Flask applications. Flask, Python's lightweight web framework, is an excellent choice for developers looking to integrate feature flags into their projects. This guide walks you through the process using the Python Server SDK, demonstrating how Statsig's tools can enhance your Flask projects.
